title: The Hairy Bikers Home for Christmas
overview: The Hairy Bikers create mouth-watering festive dishes and get into the spirit of the season with some of the nation's favourite celebrities. Being home for Christmas is a wonderful time to celebrate with friends, family and food - whether for the Big Day itself, leftover inspiration for those in-between days or in the New Year when viewers still want to indulge and keep the party going â€“ Si and Dave have the perfect solution for every occasion. Plus there is inspiration for food gifts you can make at home which are bound to impress friends and family this season. It's time to switch on the Christmas lights, light the fire, nestle down and join The Hairy Bikers Home for Christmas. Add in homemade food gifts.
